title: FontLab 2010
content: How's it progressing? Is it being built or still in the planning stages? Can we see screenshots? What's it going to be called? Is it going to run on Air, HTML 5? Is there a chance it'll be released before 2011? New features? Features removed?
author: typodermic

comments.content: From Russia with Lab... The Unofficial Guide: Soon.

Maybe the new splash screen and icon for FL6  
 [http://pejot.com/2007/01/bitfonter2-sigmaker-scanfont-i-fontlab-studio/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100404152520/http:/pejot.com/2007/01/bitfonter2-sigmaker-scanfont-i-fontlab-studio/ "http://pejot.com/2007/01/bitfonter2-sigmaker-scanfont-i-fontlab-studio/")
It's been a while since I've heard any news. Sigh.

Currently, we're working on Fontographer 5 which will premiere some new concepts. Much of the work that we've done in the last year for Fontographer 5 will get folded into FontLab Studio 6. We don't have a release deadline for FLS6 yet, nor a finalized feature list, though.

_Is it going to run on Air, HTML 5?_
